definition: cytomegalovirus retinitis, a disease of the retina that can lead to blindness/CMV retinitis
pinyin: ju4 xi4 bao1 bing4 du2 shi4 wang3 mo2 yan2

sentences.english: The OSM transgenic retinal cells underwent apoptosis indicated by TUNEL assays.
sentences.chinese: TUNEL試驗顯示轉基因鼠視網膜細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: When you have PDR , abnormal blood vessels grow in the retina.
sentences.chinese: 當你有民主共和國，異常血管生長在視網膜。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a quantifying model of retinopathy with vascular proliferation in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立可量化的血管增生性視網膜病變小鼠模型。

sentences.english: The main reasons for the failure of operation were retinal detachment and maculopathy.
sentences.chinese: 手術失敗的主要原因是視網膜脫離和黃斑病變。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the pathogenesis of primary pigmentary degeneration of retina(PPDR).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討原發性視網膜色素變性患者的發病機理。

sentences.english: Cones in each half of the retina are adapted to produce different light-filtering pigments.
sentences.chinese: 每半邊視網膜上的錐體能夠產生不同的光過濾顏色。

sentences.english: Methods 42 cases of rhegmatogenous retinal detachment had undergone scleral bulking surgery.
sentences.chinese: 方法42例孔源性非增生性視網膜脫離行鞏膜扣帶術。

sentences.english: That small set of retinal cells also stops multiplying by the time a child turns five.
sentences.chinese: 這小羣視網膜細胞在小孩子五歲的時候就不再複製了。

sentences.english: The retina, the eye ball, everything was completely destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 視網膜，眼球等所有部分都被全部炸壞了。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the cellular components of vitreous membranes and epiretinal membranes from eyes with proliferative vitreoretinopathy (PVR).
sentences.chinese: 目的鑑定人玻璃體膜及視網膜前膜的細胞成分。

sentences.english: Eye retina nerve is atrophic, can you cure?
sentences.chinese: 眼睛視網膜神經萎縮，可以治好嗎？

sentences.english: Shaking violence can include bleeding and swelling in the brain and retinal hemorrhages.
sentences.chinese: 劇烈的搖晃會導致腦出血或者腫脹以及視網膜出血。

sentences.english: It seems that ROP may relate with genetic factors.
sentences.chinese: 由此表明早產兒視網膜病變可能與遺傳因素有關。

sentences.english: The funduscopic examination showed diffuse mottling of the retinal pigmented epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 眼底鏡檢顯示視網膜色素上皮斑駁化。

sentences.english: Retinal directional selectivity is a classic example of neurocomputation.
sentences.chinese: 視網膜方向選擇性是神經計算的一個典型範例。

sentences.english: If found retinopathy, to be more of the inspection.
sentences.chinese: 若發現有視網膜病變，則須更多次的檢查。

definition: macula lutea (anatomy, central area of retina)/yellow spot
